This vignette explains how to use tosr with an example.

# History

tosr package creates the tree of science of a topic from Web of Science and Scopus. The Tree of Science concept was part of a doctorate thesis; the first paper is here:

<https://revistas.udistrital.edu.co/index.php/vinculos/article/download/9664/10837>

The concept become very popular in Colombia (South America).

We keep working in the concept and improving the algorithm during these years, and in 2020 a more sophisticate paper was accepted:

<http://www.scielo.org.co/scielo.php?pid=S0120-56092020000100045&script=sci_arttext&tlng=en>
